name: Ghetto Conspiracy Beta Fr
description:
New retro point and click

Usually people aren't eager to spend much time in a ghetto, but an exception can certainly be made for a point-and-click adventure: Ghetto Conspiracy.

Players control a young wannabe-rapper named Lucas, who drinks too much at a party one night and awakens to find his friends Camille and Tony are missing. You soon discover that Camille has been taken by the local crime boss because of a debt you owe. But even that is nothing compared to "the terrible reptilian conspiracy" at play in the secret shadows of Cheesytown. 

° Inspired by Lucasart's point and click (Day of the Tentacle, Monkey Island, Sam and Max...)

° Frame by Frame animations

°More than 40 scenes and 30 characters

There is no firm release date just yet, but we are currently targeting completion in either March or April of 2019 for Windows and Mac, with possible mobile ports to follow.
